We didn't dream up a new way to find the best ramen.
We never thought, "You know what Mars needs?"
We didn't decide you should be able to share your home with travelers...
We're not the ones who imagine one day,...
...we'd all be streaming movies or whatever she's about to do.
But when asked if these ideas were possible,...
...we're the only cloud with the capabilities,...
...experience and know-how to make them happen.
